quotes: I did not run for this job just to warm the seat. I desperately want to make a difference.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: As powerful as our memories are, our dreams must be even stronger. For when our memories outweigh our dreams, we become old.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Being president is like running a cemetery: you've got a lot of people under you and nobody's listening.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: We all do better when we work together. Our differences do matter, but our common humanity matters more.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Let us all take more responsibility not only for ourselves and our families but for our communities and our country.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: The road to tyranny, we must never forget, begins with the destruction of the truth.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Sometimes when people are under stress, they hate to think, and it's the time when they most need to think.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Mental illness is nothing to be ashamed of, but stigma and bias shame us all.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: If you want to have a good life you have to have some constructive outlet for your feelings.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Nothing big ever came from being small.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: A man is more than the sum of all the things he can do.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: People the world over have always been more impressed by the power of our example than by the example of our power.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: In the new economy, information, education and motivation are everything.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: We've got to get America back in the future business.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: It wasn't my finest hour. It wasn't even my finest hour and a half.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: I may not have been the greatest president, but I've had the most fun eight years.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: I did not have sexual relations with that woman
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: Yesterday is yesterday. If we try to recapture it, we will only lose tomorrow.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: When I was in England, I experimented with marijuana a time or two, and I didn’t like it. I didn’t inhale and never tried it again.
author: Bill Clinton

quotes: There are always going to be people who want to be president, and some days I’d like to give it to them
author: Bill Clinton
